DOC.brief_summary: Prospective, randomized, double-masked, placebo-controlled clinical study to define the effective use of a topical non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug added to topical steroid use after uncomplicated phacoemulsification for the prevention of pseudophakic cystoid macular edema.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Study With Adjunctive Once Daily Topical Nepafenac 0.3% Versus Placebo
DOC.criteria: Subjects, 18 and older subjects with visually significant cataracts and were to undergo phacoemulsification with implantation of an intracapsular positioned intraocular lens. previous uveitis (<1 year) previous anterior segment intraocular surgery hypersensitivity or allergy to NSAIDs
